Text: The USS Liberty didn't sink. The Israelis called of the attack when they realized it was an american ship. The USS Liberty was towed to Malta for repairs and remained in service until 1973, when she was sold for scrap.

"The Israelis called of the attack when they realized it was an american ship"

Then what the hell they though it was? An UFO on sea? Is it normal to attack ships on sea with no reason?

Think about it-
